doc:
Christian Marquand https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_Marquand 0 Christian Marquand (15 March 1927 – 22 November 2000) was a French director, actor and screenwriter working in French cinema. Born in Marseille, he was born to a Spanish father and an Arab mother, and his sister was film director Nadine Trintignant. He was often cast as a heartthrob in French films of the 1950s. Christian_Marquand ( 15_March_1927 – 22_November_2000 ) was a_French_director , actor_and_screenwriter_working in French_cinema . Born in Marseille , he was_born to a_Spanish_father and an_Arab_mother , and his_sister was film_director_Nadine_Trintignant . He was_often_cast as a_heartthrob in French_films of the_1950s .
